lines:
-M*C, & Co., Ltd., Lân.-.-5,0€.

3r 29 Ex refund Luck. 
Imperial Railways of North China.

Tongshan 16th March 1909.

A. E. Stearns Esq, 
Phillips Academy,

Andover, Mass. U.S.A. 
Dear Sir,

Herewith I am sending you a duplicate copy of the letter & 
the Second tenor of the demand draft of Exchange for $500.00 Gold,

The first of same was mailed here to you on the 9th inst. 
which I hope it had reached you in safety ere this.

Please kindly favour me with an acknowledgement on receipt 
of same and much oblige.

Yours truly.

H. S. Luk
raw: -M*C, & Co., Ltd., Lân.-.-5,0€.  3r 29 Ex refund Luck.  Imperial Railways of North China.  Tongshan 16th March 1909.  A. E. Stearns Esq,  Phillips Academy,  Andover, Mass. U.S.A.  Dear Sir,  Herewith I am sending you a duplicate copy of the letter &  the Second tenor of the demand draft of Exchange for $500.00 Gold,  The first of same was mailed here to you on the 9th inst.  which I hope it had reached you in safety ere this.  Please kindly favour me with an acknowledgement on receipt  of same and much oblige.  Yours truly.  H. S. Luk

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter stating that he was sending a duplicate of his letter of March 9th, along with a second tenor of the demand draft of exchange for $500 gold. He requests a receipt.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
